doc: Make sure you are running the latest version of Home Assistant before reporting an issue.

You should only file an issue if you found a bug. Feature and enhancement requests should go in [the Feature Requests section](https://community.home-assistant.io/c/feature-requests) of our community forum:
I know how to stop it. I found a few "fixes"/work-arounds.
1. Zoom out in the browser a few times.
2. Click on the hamburger icon. Well, this fixes it sometimes. It depends on how many columns of panels are visible.
3. Run chrome full-screen instead of a window.
That's all I got. I tried incognito and cache/cookie. etc. Nothing fixed it.
